200.description: Timestamp of latest update in ISO format

Physical or logical location of the display
X coordinate (in pixels) of the top-left corner of the display in screen
Y coordinate (in pixels) of the top-left corner of the display in screen

examples.title: 200 OK
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "id": 5,
  "name": "RPI3",
  "description": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet...",
  "location": "Stage D",
  "width_mm": 200,
  "height_mm": 113,
  "width_px": 1920,
  "height_px": 1080,
  "x": 0,
  "y": 0,
  "ssh": "ssh://192.168.4.15",

  "createdAt": "2015-08-31T14:35:21.202Z",
  "updatedAt": "2015-08-31T14:35:21.202Z",
  "ScreenId": 3
}
